hero.name: Shaimaa Dwedar
hero.subtitle: Passionate Flutter & Full Stack Developer | Computer Engineering Student | AI & Tech Enthusiast
hero.description: Specialized in building cross-platform mobile and web applications using Flutter, with experience in AI integration and building innovative Full-Stack solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: Passionate Flutter Developer and Computer Engineering student specializing in building cross-platform mobile and web apps with Clean Architecture, MVVM, and AI-powered features.
about.description: Experienced in building offline-first solutions, PostgreSQL integration, and creating seamless user experiences using Flutter and Dart. I love continuous learning and exploring modern technologies to build innovative applications that solve real problems.

education.degreeDesc: 5th-year student with a strong focus on Full-Stack development, mobile apps, and AI integration.
education.traineeDesc: Developing cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter with MVVM and Clean Architecture implementation.

tasks: Developed and maintained cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter & Dart
Implemented MVVM architecture to separate UI and business logic
Applied SOLID principles and Clean Code practices
Added AI-powered Speech-to-Text features using Whisper API
Delivered multilingual support (Arabic & English) with offline functionality
Built Full-Stack mobile and web applications using Flutter & React
Integrated AI features like idea suggestions & Speech-to-Text
Managed projects from planning to implementation independently
Applied best practices in code quality and architectural design

ideasTrackerMobile.name: IdeasTracker Mobile
ideasTrackerMobile.description: Cross-platform mobile app with offline-first support synced to PostgreSQL. Features AI-powered idea suggestions and voice input using Speech-to-Text.

ideasTrackerWeb.name: IdeasTracker Web
ideasTrackerWeb.description: Web application for collecting and organizing ideas using voice input. Features an AI chatbot to help users refine their ideas with real-time updates.

timeCapsule.name: Time Capsule App
timeCapsule.description: Mobile app for saving memories and future messages with offline-first support and seamless cloud database sync.

hajjCompanion.name: Hajj Companion App
hajjCompanion.description: Comprehensive mobile and web app to assist pilgrims with AI-enhanced modules like smart reminders and predictive text suggestions.

miniCommunication.name: Mini Communication App
miniCommunication.description: Full communication app to practice end-to-end development skills with clean UI design and intuitive user experience.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.intro: Have a project in mind or want to collaborate? Feel free to reach out!
